title: QUADRATTA SERIF, wedge-serif release: 20% OFF!
content:

comments.content:
Very nice work, Fernando!  
Does it have a Sans version too?

Yes, looks good! Don't you sell a bold version of it? In the PDF there is one …

Edit:  
I'm interested in a PDF that show \*all\* glyphs.

Yes im working on a bold version and bold-italic version

Almost finished... next to come...

And, in some months i will lunch Quadratta Serif Pro with all the glyphs and all versions  
Greetings  
Ferch

[Tipografía-Montevideo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014095016/http:/www.tipografia-montevideo.info/)
There is an "r" missing in the MyFonts graphic -- it reads "Quadatta Serif."

haha

Yes, thats my bad... i made it super fast... but i've corrected it some days ago... im expecting an update

thanx

Fernando

[Tipografía-Montevideo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014095016/http:/www.tipografia-montevideo.info/)
